message: This seems to be an index based on the popularity of searches for programming language.  So the claim that _"The index can be used to check whether your programming skills are still up to date or to make a strategic decision about what programming language should be adopted when starting to build a new software system"_ seems to be questionable at the very least.
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: TIOBE Index | TIOBE - The Software Quality Company
caption: tiobe.com
description: The TIOBE Programming Community index is an indicator of the popularity of programming languages.
